td.content: s:a 32 yr old female presents with Heart for 6 weeks. o:Height 67 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Hemorrhagic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:32 yr old white female presents with Heart for past 5 weeks. Denies ever using tobacco denies any alcohol use o:Height 67 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Hemorrhagic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed protamine sulfate - 1 mg /90 units of heparin overdosage, and ordered Aneurysm clipping - subarachnoid.

content2.Unmatched: Denies ever using tobacco denies any alcohol use

td.content: s:33 yr old white F interrogator presents with 2 years history of Heart. o:Height 67 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Hemorrhagic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:a 33 yr old F interrogator complains of Heart. NKDA. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 66 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15 a:Hemorrhagic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed protamine sulfate - 1 mg /90 units of heparin overdosage, and ordered Aneurysm clipping - subarachnoid.
